sentences.en: A brilliant shaft of sunlight burst through the doorway.
sentences.cn: 一束耀眼的阳光从门口照射进来。

sentences.en: A crew was sent down the shaft to close it off and bail out all the water.
sentences.cn: 一组人员被派下矿井将其封闭并把水舀干。

sentences.en: A gray brick tunnel, dimly lighted, led to the elevator shaft.
sentences.cn: 一条点着昏暗灯光的灰色砖砌通道通往电梯的并道.

sentences.en: A piston links to a drive shaft by means of a connecting rod.
sentences.cn: 活塞通过连杆与驱动轴相连.

sentences.en: A residue can build up on the hair shaft, leaving the hair limp and dull looking.
sentences.cn: 残留物会积聚在头发上，使头发看起来软塌塌的，而且毫无光泽。

sentences.en: A worker was decapitated when a lift plummeted down the shaft on top of him.
sentences.cn: 电梯沿着电梯井垂直坠落，把一名工人砸得身首异处。

sentences.en: An insect appendage consists typically of a limb base and a shaft.
sentences.cn: 昆虫典型的附肢包括肢基体和干.

sentences.en: He was found dead at the bottom of a lift shaft.
sentences.cn: 他被发现死在了电梯井的底部。

sentences.en: He was wounded by a shaft.
In course of sinking the well - shaft they came upon a deposit of a very rare mineral.
sentences.cn: 他们在凿井的过程中,发现了一处稀有矿物矿床.

sentences.en: In the coal shaft the working - men pushed the coal cars sullenly.
sentences.cn: 工人们在煤矿里慢吞吞地推着煤车.

sentences.en: Once the ventilator shaft became blocked, the warehouse quickly filled with fumes.
sentences.cn: 通风管一旦堵塞, 仓库很快就充满了烟雾.

sentences.en: The depth of the shaft is 520 yards.
The equipment was taken down the shaft in pieces.
sentences.cn: 该设备被拆卸成几部分送下了井。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 传动轴；主动轴（组合器轴）
井筒支护；轴包覆，竖井衬层
轴封，轴封装置；主轴密封

trans.tran_en: a long handle on a tool, spear etc

trans.tran_cn: 给…装上杆柄，〈俚〉苛刻的对待
